item.title: Life events
item.description: I am now a Research Assistant at Beijing Normal University, China. And I studied here for long years through my bachelor and master degrees. Education: 2014-2017, Master Degree, Beijing Normal University, Cognitive Neuroscience 2009-2013, Bachelor Degree, Beijing Normal University, Statistics
